author: perezhilton
title: $4.5 Million Worth Of Makeup Stolen In Crazy Heist!
text:
Is this some elaborate promo for Ocean's 8 ???
The LAPD is investigating after $4.5 million worth of Anastasia Beverly Hills makeup products was stolen from a Los Angeles warehouse.
Related: Miami Lawyer's Pants Catch Fire During Arson Trial
Police believe thieves cut a hole in the roof of the warehouse to get to their loot, and made off with 100K packages of the "Modern Renaissance" eye shadow palette. Investigators estimate the cost to be around $4.5 million, with the palette retailing at stores for $42.
Isn't this crazy???
We never thought we'd live to see the day someone pulled off a MAKEUP HEIST, for crying out loud!
Honestly, though, this would make a great case for Sandra Bullock to investigate in a Miss Congeniality sequel. Do it, Hollywood!
P.S. - if you happen to find an Anastasia palette for sale for cheap from a questionable source over the next few days, it might just be real â€” and stolen!
Tags: anastasia beverly hills , beauty buzz , crazzzzy , gifs , makeup heist , makeup magic! , sandra bullock , viral: news
